summary: This is an internal email from the Metropolitan Correctional Center regarding the housing of Jeffrey Epstein, discussing a suggestion from the National Suicide Prevention Coordinator to house him with another sex offender in SHU and confirming the plan to keep him in his current location.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email discussing his housing arrangements and suicide prevention measures while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: EMPLOYEE 19
persons.context: The sender of the email who is discussing Epstein's housing with the National Suicide Prevention Coordinator and planning to visit the hospital.

events.title: Discussion of Epstein's Housing
events.description: Internal email discussion about housing Jeffrey Epstein with another sex offender in SHU per suggestion from National Suicide Prevention Coordinator.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The National Suicide Prevention Coordinator suggested housing Jeffrey Epstein with another sex offender in SHU.
The plan was already in place to keep Epstein 'down here for a bit' at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
This email was sent on July 25, 2019, shortly before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The email shows internal discussions about Epstein's housing and suicide prevention measures while in custody.
The sender (EMPLOYEE 19) mentions heading to the hospital, suggesting medical considerations were part of the discussion.
